references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces the ResNet architecture, a fundamental building block in many deep learning models used in the paper's experiments.

references.paper_title: Benchmarking neural network robustness to common corruptions and perturbations
references.reason: This paper introduces the ImageNet-C dataset, a crucial benchmark dataset used in the paper to evaluate the robustness of the proposed TTA method.

references.paper_title: Tent: Fully test-time adaptation by entropy minimization
references.reason: This paper proposes the TENT method, a significant baseline method used for comparison and analysis of the proposed lightweight TTA method.

references.paper_title: Batch normalization: Accelerating deep network training by reducing internal covariate shift
references.reason: This paper introduces batch normalization, a crucial technique used to stabilize the training of deep neural networks and which is relevant to the paper's discussion of test-time adaptation.
This paper introduces domain-adversarial training, a key technique used in domain adaptation, which is closely related to the concept of test-time adaptation addressed in this paper.
